description: This file defines custom exception classes related to agent execution, error handling, and model provider errors within the project.

classes.name: AgentRunException
classes.description: Base exception class for agent run errors, supporting additional context like messages and stop execution flag.

classes.name: RetryAgentRun
classes.description: Exception indicating a tool call should be retried, subclass of AgentRunException.

classes.name: StopAgentRun
classes.description: Exception indicating an agent should stop executing entirely, subclass of AgentRunException.

classes.name: RunCancelledException
classes.description: Exception raised when a run is cancelled by the user.

classes.name: AgnoError
classes.description: General internal error exception with message and status code.

classes.name: ModelProviderError
classes.description: Error class for model provider errors, subclass of AgnoError.

classes.name: ModelRateLimitError
classes.description: Error class for rate limit errors from model providers, subclass of ModelProviderError.

classes.name: EvalError
classes.description: Exception raised when an evaluation fails.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Constructors for each exception class, initializing relevant attributes.

methods.name: __str__
methods.description: Returns string representation of AgnoError message.
